home.TITLE: Home
home.MAIN_MESSAGE: Unleash Your Gaming Prowess and Dive into Captivating Podcasts
home.MESSAGE2:
Experience the thrill of live gaming and immerse yourself in
captivating podcasts on WebLive. Join now for endless entertainment in
one place.

privacy.TITLE: Privacy
privacy.CHANGE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Changing your password will log you out of all your devices

profile.UPLOAD_PICTURE_DESCRIPTION: Upload a picture from your computer
profile.PIRCTURE_FORMATS: Only JPG, PNG and GIF formats are allowed

live.NO_STREAM: You don't have a stream yet, click start to start streaming

resendVerification.TITLE: Resend Verification
resendVerification.DESCRIPTION: Would you like us to re-send the verification email to :email?

completeAccount.TITLE: Complete Account
completeAccount.DESCRIPTION: We noticed that you've chosen to log in using your [Discord/Google] account. To enhance the security of your account and allow you to access your account independently, we require you to set a unique password.
